title: Sheila Bridges
description: Debbie Millman talks to interior designer Sheila Bridges about being one of the only prominent African Americans in her industry, about losing her hair and having Bill Clinton as a client.
itunes:subtitle: Debbie Millman talks to  interior designer Sheila Bridges about being one of the only prominent  African Americans in her industry, about losing her hair and having Bill Clinton  as a client.
author: podcasts@ted.com (Design Matters Media)
